name: Rewind Cave
description:
DISCLAIMER - WE DO NOT RECOMMEND PLAYING THIS ON THE BROWSER AS IT DOESN'T WORK AT CERTAIN RESOLUTION - IF YOU DO, PLAY IT FULLSCREEN TO REDUCE THE CHANCE OF VISUAL BUGS.

Please, download the project for the best experience.

---

This project was made in 7 days for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam by a team of 4, CocoMendes, Guy, Rockwizard and hawkyre.

The mechanics are simple, and although they're also explained in-game I'll tell you a few of them here:

  • Avoid the lava and bullets (You have 3 lives)
  • Collect the gems
  • Rewind the cave / bullets as you please to beat the level
  • The bar shown to the left when you're not rewinding is a lava proximeter, it shows how close is the current tile to becoming lava
  • The bar shown to the left while you rewind is the rewinding meter, which simply shows how much rewind time you have left (it reloads while you don't use it). Be careful about exhausting it though, it will take a while to reload!

Tip: Start on easy, even though you can play any level in any order

I hope you enjoy it, leave a comment and I'll go check out your game!

I'll be uploading a video on my new YouTube channel really soon, so go check it out if you're interested: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPGkS4pHLvF6VPbAUnkayOg

Thanks for playing!
